item.description:
Join TTDB and our members for our first Boston chocolate tasting. We have hooked up with one of the best in Boston, Beacon Hill Chocolates to taste, learn and taste some more.

Beacon Hill Chocolates offers a taste of some of the most unique and exquisite chocolates from around the world. From their new location on Charles Street, right in the heart of Beacon Hill, they hand-select each piece from different chocolate artisans, each with their own individual style and flavor combinations, including fine Belgium chocolate and small chocolatiers from all over the country.

The chocolates can be enjoyed by the piece, or in one of their many beautiful keepsake boxes featuring historical images from the Boston Library and the Boston Athenaeum. In addition to their truffles, they also carry a wide selection of chocolate confections, varietal bars, locally-made fudge, cupcakes and Italian artisan gelato.

Come join us for a taste of chocolate tradition, and a touch of elegance with each piece.

The offerings at the tasting will be a variety of 6 different chocolates, red wine, a sparkling white wine water and will end with a gelato sampling. All while we learn about the chocolate.

Suggested Attire: Comfortable/Business Casual

Directions: 91 Charles Street Boston, MA 02114

Directions:
http://maps.google.co...

Cost: $28.00

GET YOUR TICKETS AT OUR WEBSITE:
www.thingstodoboston.com
item.name: Chocolate Tour: Everything You Need and Want to Know About Chocolate
